Title: SharePoint Theme Applicator
Description: SharePoint Theme Applicator will give SharePoint administrators the ability to apply a theme accross a whole web application (i.e. apply a theme to all site collections and all webs under the site collections). This was developed in C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SharePoint Theme Applicator will give SharePoint administrators the ability to apply a theme accross a whole web application (i.e. apply a theme to all site collections and all webs under the site collections). This was developed in C# and WPF.

Features

This simple application will enable SharePoint admins to apply a theme across a whole entire web application. This could make a great tool to apply a unified theme across all sites for a newly setup or existing SharePoint portal environment.
  • Provides the total number of site collections in the giving web application.
  • Provides the total number of webs in the giving web application.
  • Provides a window that shows the current sites the theme is being applied to.
  • Provides a status of the overall progress and how many site collections and webs are still to go.
  • Provides a status of the overall progress using a progress bar.

Requirements

The application may only be run on the SharePoint server itself, with an account that has sufficient permissions.
